document_data.name: Markao Jaitzen
document_data.mainbody: '''Markao Jaitzen''' was a [[sohei]] participant at the [[Komite]] in [[Shou Lung]].
document_data.History: Markao Jaitzen was a sohei at the [[Temple of True Enlightenment]] in [[Suijeng]], training under [[Wa-an dictionary#S|''sensei'']] [[Lu-che]]. In [[1358 DR]], Markao Jaitzen went to participate at the Komite. However, he knew it was not possible for him to win. He only wanted to honor his teacher and get practice against strong adversaries.
